In order to perform actions on this mail: Domin yin ayyuka a wannan akwatin gidan waya, kana buƙatar warware matsalar sync. Ziyarci Bincike> Lambobin don ƙarin bayani.
In order to send mail through Mailspring: Don aika wasikar ta hanyar Mailspring, asusun imel ɗinka dole ne a sami babban fayil na Sent Mail. Zaka iya saka fayil din da aka aika tare da hannu ta ziyartar Abubuwan Zaɓuɓɓuka> Folders kuma zaɓar sunan babban fayil daga menu na zaɓuɓɓuka.

Domin aika wasikar ta hanyar Mailspring, asusun imel ɗinka dole ne a sami babban fayil na Trash. Zaka iya saka fayil ɗin Shara ta hannu ta hanyar ziyartar Abubuwan Zaɓuɓɓuka> Folders kuma zaɓar sunan babban fayil daga menu na zaɓuɓɓuka.
Invalid template name! Names can only co: Sunan samfuri mara inganci! Sunan suna iya ƙunshe da haruffa, lambobi, wurare, dashes, da underscores.

Mailspring can't find your Drafts folder: Kuskuren ba zai iya samo babban fayil ɗin Drafts ba. Don ƙirƙirar da aika wasikar, ziyarci Abubuwan Zaɓuɓɓuka> Folders kuma zaɓi babban fayil ɗin Rubutun.
Mailspring could not find the mailsync p: Mailspring iya samun hanyar mailsync. Idan kana gina Mailspring daga tushe, tabbatar cewa an sauke da email kuma mai ba da izini a mai sarrafa mailsync.tar.gz.
Mailspring could not save an attachment: Kusawa ba zai iya adana haɗe-haɗe ba saboda ka gudu daga sararin sarari.

Mailspring encountered errors syncing th: Mailspring ci karo da kurakurai daidaita wannan asusun. An aika rahoto crash zuwa tawagar Mailspring kuma za muyi aiki don gyara wadannan kurakurai a cikin saki na gaba.
Mailspring is clearing it's cache for %@: Kuskuren yana share shi cache don %@. Dangane da girman akwatin gidan waya, wannan na iya ɗaukar 'yan kaɗan ko mintoci kaɗan. Za a bayyana faɗakarwa lokacin da tsabtacewa ta cika.
Mailspring is independent %@ software, a: Shirye-shiryen shi ne software mai zaman kanta %@, kuma biyan kuɗin kuɗin yana ba mu damar yin amfani da lokaci don inganta kayan aiki.
Mailspring is running in dev mode and ma: Kusawa yana gudana cikin yanayin karkatawa kuma yana iya kasancewa hankali!
Mailspring is syncing this thread and it: Mailspring yana daidaita wannan zane kuma yana da haɗe-haɗe zuwa girgije. Don dogon lokaci, wannan zai dauki lokaci.
Mailspring reset the local cache for %@: Sake saita saiti na gida don %@ a %@ seconds. Akwatin gidan waya ɗinka zata fara sake gamawa.
Mailspring shows you everything about yo: Mailspring ya nuna maka kome game da lambobinka daidai a cikin akwatin saƙo naka. Duba bayanan LinkedIn, shafukan Twitter, tarihin saƙo, da sauransu.
Mailspring was unable to modify your key: Kuskuren bai iya canza maɓallin keymaps a %@ ba.
Mailspring was unable to read the conten: Kuskuren bai iya karanta abinda ke ciki na jagorar shafukanku ba (%@). Kuna so ku share wannan babban fayil ko tabbatar da izinin fayilolin fayiloli an saita daidai.
Mailspring was unable to reset the local: Mailspring bai iya sake saita cache na gida ba. %@

Don kunna karɓar takardun karɓa da kuma danganta sakonni a kan imel ɗin da ka aiko, danna %@ ko haɗin maɓallin tracking %@ gumaka a cikin mai kirkiro.

When composing, automatically: A yayin da yake kunsa, ta atomatik
When enabled, Mailspring will notify you: Lokacin da aka kunna, Mailspring zai sanar da ku da zarar wani ya karanta wannan sakon. Aikawa zuwa rukuni? Mailspring ya nuna maka abin da masu karɓa suka buɗe adireshin imel ɗinka saboda haka zaka iya biyo baya tare da daidaituwa.
When link tracking is turned on, Mailspr: Lokacin da aka haɗa maɓallin link, Mailspring zai sanar da ku lokacin da masu karɓa suka danna hanyoyin haɗi a wannan imel ɗin.
When reading messages, mark as read: Lokacin karanta saƙonni, alamar kamar yadda aka karanta

Would you like to make Mailspring your d: Kuna so ku sanya Mailspring your abokin ciniki tsoho ta asali?
Write better emails with LinkedIn profil: Rubuta imel mafi kyau tare da bayanan LinkedIn, Twitter bios, tarihin saƙo, da kuma karin a gefen dama.
You are using %@, which is free! You can: Kuna amfani da %@, wanda yake kyauta! Za ka iya haɗawa har zuwa asusun imel huɗu kuma ka gwada abubuwan fasalin kamar aikawa daga baya, karanta karɓa da tunatarwa sau da yawa a mako.
Kuna amfani da %@, wanda yake kyauta! Zaka iya haɗuwa har zuwa asusun imel huɗu kuma gwada fasali kamar fasikanci, aikawa daga baya, karanta karɓa da tunatarwa sau da yawa a mako.
You can add reminders to %1$@ emails eac: Zaka iya ƙara masu tuni zuwa imel ɗin %1$@ kowane %@ da Basic Basic.
You can choose a shortcut set to use key: Zaka iya zaɓar tsari na gajeren hanya don amfani da gajerun hanyoyin keyboard na abokan ciniki na saba. Don shirya gajeren hanya, danna shi a lissafin da ke ƙasa kuma shigar da sauyawa a kan keyboard.
You can get open and click notifications: Kuna iya budewa kuma danna sanarwar ga imel %1$@ kowane %@ da Basic Mailspring.
You can schedule sending of %1$@ emails: Kuna iya tsara aikawar imel ɗin %@ kowane %@ da Basic Mailspring.
You can share %1$@ emails each %2$@ with: Kuna iya raba imel ɗin %1$@ kowace %@ da Basic Basic.
You can snooze %1$@ emails each %2$@ wit: Za ka iya snooze imel %@ kowane %@ da Basic Basic.
You can switch back to stable from the p: Zaka iya komawa zuwa barga daga zaɓin.
You can view contact profiles for %1$@ e: Zaka iya duba bayanan martaba na imel %1$@ kowace %@ da Basic Mailspring.
You haven't created any mail rules. To g: Ba ku kirkiro kowace doka ba. Don farawa, ƙayyade sabuwar doka a sama kuma gaya Mailspring yadda za a aiwatar da akwatin saƙo naka.
You may need to %@ to your Yandex accoun: Kana iya buƙatar %@ zuwa asusunka na Yandex kafin ka haɗa saƙon imel. Idan ka yi amfani da biyu-factor auth, kana buƙatar ƙirƙirar %@ don Mailspring.
You may need to configure aliases with y: Kila iya buƙatar alaƙa tare da mai bada sabis (Outlook, Gmail) kafin amfani da su.

Your `Trash` folder could not be automat: Ba a iya gano fayilolin 'Trash` ɗinka ta atomatik ba. Ziyarci Bincike> Jakunkuna don zaɓar babban fayil ɗin Shara sannan kuma sake gwadawa.

iCloud requires that you create a unique: iCloud yana buƙatar ka ƙirƙirar ƙwaƙwalwar buƙata ta musamman don aikace-aikacen imel kamar Mailspring. Bi %@ don ƙirƙirar ɗaya sannan kuma manna shi a kasa.
